remarks: Formula building theorem for support restrictions: operator with left annihilator.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
suppssov1.s $e |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. D |-> A ) supp Y ) C_ L ) $.
suppssov1.o $e |- ( ( ph /\ v e. R ) -> ( Y O v ) = Z ) $.
suppssov1.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> A e. V ) $.
suppssov1.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> B e. R ) $.
suppssov1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. W ) $.
suppssov1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. D |-> ( A O B ) ) supp Z ) C_ L ) $.
$d B v $.
$d D x $.
$d O v $.
$d R v $.
$d Y v $.
$d Y x $.
$d Z v $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph v $.
$d ph x $.
